constituent: riot, tongue, thousand, drop, ten, needle, mouth, fishhook
kunYomi: みだ.れる、みだ.る、みだ.す、みだ、おさ.める、わた.る
myStory: đánh nhau. đánh nhau vì móc lưỡi.
readingExamples: 乱す (みだ.す), 乱れる (みだ.れる)
words: civil war, insurrection, rebellion, domestic conflict
to throw out of order, to disarrange, to disturb
to get confused, to be disordered, to be disturbed
rude, violent, rough, lawless, unreasonable, reckless
